III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) The facility is not required to follow the ISEP.
3.) The facility does not contract with MDHHS.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
No technical assistance was required at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
No consultation was required or requested at this time.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care, or child abuse or
neglect during this licensing period.
The facility had no DCWL investigations requiring a corrective action plan during this
licensing period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
